00000vish/Win-Startup-Manager

Controls startup processes with timers and arguments

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Collection of 700 tools for startup founders
  • Curated resources for startup founders
  • Swift framework for timer management and state control
  • Window manager for Windows with C# scripting
  • Manages startup items and edits host files
  • Process manager using LLMs to analyze and roast system activity
  • Process manager with a terminal interface
  • Runs macOS apps and scripts placed in a folder at startup
  • GUI for Windows package managers like WinGet, Scoop, and Chocolatey
